path /v3/blockchain/token/transaction/chain/address/tokenAddress
operationId Erc20GetTransactionByAddress
parameters
description The blockchain to work with
in path
name chain
required True
schema
type string
description Account address you want to get balance of
in path
name address
required True
schema
type string
description Address of the token smart contract or asset id in case of ALGO
in path
name tokenAddress
required True
schema
type string
description Max number of items per page is 50
in query
name pageSize
schema
type number
maximum 50
minimum 1
required True
description Offset to obtain next page of the data
in query
name offset
schema
type number
description Transactions from this block onwards will be included
in query
name from
schema
type number
minimum 0
description Transactions up to this block will be included
in query
name to
schema
type number
minimum 0
description Sorting of the data ASC  oldest first DESC  newest first
in query
name sort
schema
type string
default DESC
summary Get fungible token transactions on a blockchain address
description 1 credit per API call
Get incoming and outgoing transactions related to fungible tokens on a blockchain address
This API is supported for the following blockchains

Algorand
Celo
Ethereum
Polygon
responses
200
schema
type array
FungibleTx
type object

blockNumber

type string

amount

from
type string

type string
description recipient

txId

contractAddress
amount
